name: Just Dance® 4
description: Take the party to a whole new level of fun with Just Dance®4! Discover over 40 chart-topping hits from “Good Feeling” by Flo Rida, and “What Makes You Beautiful” by One Direction to exclusive Wii U™ tracks “Domino” by Jessie J, “Ain’t No Other Man” by The Girly Team, and “Want U Back” by Cher Llyod Ft. Astro. Somebody wants to use the TV? Take the Wii U™ GamePad with you and use it as a standalone system to keep on dancing in another room.
